summary: This will replace your main menu music to use malukah\'s \"Age of Oppression\" composition.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:[/b]

This is an Introduction Music Replacement mod that will replace the music of the main menu screen to Malukah\'s \"Age of Oppression\" custom arrangement. She did some amazing things to this composition and has really made it her own. I have seen no other mods that make use of this extraordinary piece of work and have frankly overused her Dragonborn Comes song, without properly paying attention to her other works of art.

[b]Original YouTube Video:[/b]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QzHXt6n1QhM

[b]Installation:[/b]

Just drag the Music folder in your [b]\".../skyrim/data\"[/b] folder

Reverse the process to uninstall.

-Elementxstyle

Credits to the Stream Monsters for being awesome!
http://twitch.tv/elementxstyle
author: elementxstyle
